description:
Keep notes where ever you are, regardless of precipitation and temperature. This pressurized pen writes through water, mud, sweat and grease, so you'll never miss recording important information.

  • Rubberized plastic barrel with grip channels
  • Pressurized cartridge operates at any angle, under water up to 10.5m deep, and (theoretically) at temperatures from -34 to 120°C
name: Rite in the Rain All-Weather Pen - Black Ink
